import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_8ibk5bo', 'template_hpjpxvp', form.current, 'D-sQmi_DiFtwlOltP') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }) e.target.reset() }; return (
